titles: By the King whereas the Kings Maiestie hath alwayes bene ready to imbrace and cherish such a perfect amitie betweene him and the king of Spaine ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.
publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: Other title information from first 2 lines of text.
"Giuen at our Castle of Windsor the viij. of Iuly 1605. in the third yeere of our Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
